name: Senior Division - Balboa Team N.E.S
description: The SFRPD Youth Flag Football League is a co-ed non-contact 5 x 5 league with an emphasis finesse and technique, with running plays, passing plays and route running. Players learn different positions and build the skills needed to be successful at each position. The league is available for two age groups: The Future stars Division (ages: 8-10). The Showcase division (ages: 11-13) both divisions are a 5 on 5 passing only non-blocking league, all participants will play in a healthy competitive env

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
address: Ocean & San Jose Avenue , San Francisco, CA, 94112
